champ_0060_rival_01:
Before you take on a Gym, it’s good to see if you
can find the battle court in town and check it out.[npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_02:
It helps to see where the court is, what it’s made
of—stuff like that. Those things might affect how\r
the battle goes![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_03:
[BD06:0]Y’know, [trnm:0], one look at
your\r
face,\r
and\r
it’s\r
obvious\r
that\r
you’re\r
getting\r
even stronger![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_04:
I think it’s time I started introducing you to some
of my harder hitters![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_06: Let’s have us a fruitful battle![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_07a:
Man, you sure battle like someone with more
than two Gym Badges![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_07b:
Oof, sorry! That’s my bad for sending out such
strong Pokémon.[npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_08: Well, that was a great battle! Fruitful for sure![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_09:
I’d challenge you again literally right now...
but Champions have to be understanding.\r
So I’ll hang back and respect your time![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_10:
Keep on collecting badges for now, and let’s
battle next time we run into each other at a Gym![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_12:
I hope you get even stronger. Like, way...way...
WAY stronger![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_13:
And once you do, you and me can just battle
our hearts out![npcn:4]
champ_0060_rival_14:
All right, time for you to whup that Gym Test.
Thanks for this![npcn:4]
